confirmationMessage.body: You have just registered a new Startup in the Open Marketplace.

timeoutErrorMessage.body: There was a connection error, please try again in a few minutes. If this error continues to occurs, please contact the platform administrators to help you resolve the problem.

summarySentence.string: as a target audience, and offers a solution for the

sections.helpText: The following information is needed to register your startup.

questions.label: Logo
questions.helpText: Upload image in JPEG or PNG format and a maximum size of 2MB

questions.errorMsg: check it's a valid Linkedin link
questions.helpText: Add a link to the Linkedin profile

questions.label: In which country does the company have its headquarters?
questions.helpText: From where the company usually operates

sections.helpText: Add information about the team members. Only the main contact is mandatory.

questions.helpText: We will only use it to verify that you are of legal age

questions.errorMsg: check it's a valid Linkedin link
questions.helpText: Add the link to their LinkedIn

sections.helpText: The information you provide will be essential in the evaluation of your startup by our Business experts.

questions.label: Define your product/service depending on the following list
If you chose "Others", indicate which ones
questions.helpText: Write any other TAGs not listed above, separated by a comma

questions.label: Region where your company currently operates
Describe your business in 140 characters
Explain your business in a 1 minute video (Elevator pitch)
questions.helpText: It's very important so that the BBVA Business Units can evaluate your project. The online video should be YouTube or Vimeo, and public.

questions.label: What's your company’s development stage?
questions.helpText: Pre-Seed (idea) / Seed (working on product) / Early Stage (close to market or already launched) / Growth stage (raised money and scaling) / Mature business (Established company with revenues)

questions.label: Has your startup worked or given service to any company?
What type of collaborations have you carried out with other companies?
questions.helpText: Please, make sure that all the information you share is not confidential.

questions.label: Please, indicate the names of the companies with which you have collaborated
questions.helpText: Make sure you have the relevant authorizations to use here the trade names/brands of these companies.

questions.label: How do you make money? Explain your business model
What's the market target group of your solution?
If you chose "Others", indicate which ones
questions.helpText: Write any other TAGs not listed above, separated by a comma

questions.label: Who are your main competitors?

questions.text: How many active users do you have?
questions.helpText: Enter the number of active users

questions.label: What was your revenue in 2017?
What has been the accumulated financing since inception?

questions.text: What kind of investment do you seek?

questions.label: Describe your product/solution in 140 characters

sections.helpText: The information you provide will be essential in the evaluation of your startup by experts from Data, Experience and Technology.

questions.label: Which sectors or areas is your solution focused on?
If you chose "Others", indicate which ones
questions.helpText: Write any other TAGs not listed above, separated by a comma

questions.label: What technology does your product use?
If you chose "Others", indicate which ones
questions.helpText: Write any other TAGs not listed above, separated by a comma

questions.label: Describe your product/technology in depth
questions.helpText: Describe in detail infrastructure, tools, platforms, each of its layers and communication between them and third parties, security mechanisms as well as algorithmic techniques.

questions.label: Which algorithm technique is the product based on? Any concise information describing the data transformation and analytical modelling pipeline is useful for evaluation.
Which metrics are used for measuring algorithmic performance?
What is your product development stage?
Have you run any tests on the prototypes of your product or service with users?
questions.helpText: Explain if you have created and tested a prototype

questions.label: Have you run any user testing of your product?
questions.helpText: Explain if you have run any test of your product with users.

questions.label: Product web, product app, product demo etc.
Data volume
Describe how data is captured and consumed in terms of data architecture
Describe your infrastructure scalability

sections.helpText: Anything else you would like to tell us about your company?

questions.label: What have been the most significant milestones (awards, number of users, validations, funding round...)?
